name: Shadows of the Mountains

Talk to ??? or repair one of the inscriptions.
<color=#ffffff>Starting Location</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Sulfurous Veins, Natlan</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Chain</color>
World Quest Series:

customize.name: Shadows of the Mountains
customize.desc: A World Quest series following Titu, a storyteller, to investigate the Shadow Pins.

customize.name: Beneath the Crystal Rock
customize.desc: Help Titu resolve the Shadow Pin issue and reinforce the seal placed upon the Abyss.

customize.name: Peace to the Slumbering
customize.desc: The Greater Shadow Pin falls, opening a huge hole in the ground...

customize.name: "Children of Echoes" Reputation EXP
customize.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Children of Echoes)

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.name: Primogem

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)</color>
<color=#ffffff>Achievement</color>
<color=#ffffff>Reward</color>
<color=#ffd780>Peace to the Slumbering</color>
<color=#ffffff>Ancestral Reminiscence</color>
Helped Titu liberate the souls of the tribe's ancestors.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Children of Echoes
customize.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Nanatzcayan. The tribe's people are famous for mining and live alongside the Tepetlisaurs.

customize.name: Little One
customize.desc: A little Tepetlisaurus that received theBlessing. It accompanied the Traveler on a pilgrimage to the Great Volcano of Tollan to remove the mark.

customize.name: Titu
customize.desc: Storyteller of the Children of Echoes and a guard at the sentry post. The real Titu lived about 500 years ago, and then his image was used by Waxaklahun Ubah Kan.

customize.name: Iridescent Inscription Fragment
customize.desc: A fragment of a shattered Iridescent Inscription. It is broken beyond repair and can no longer serve its purpose. Though dismissed by many as delusional obsession, some still believe they hold the key to unraveling messages from ancient civilizations.
